sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import '../css/App.css' import { Row, Col } from 'react-grid-system' const IMG_BASE_URL = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/" const genresUrl = "https://api.themoviedb.org/3/genre/movie/list?api_key=da007e76d36aca68e174f2948e09389c&language=en-US" const MovieDetails = () => { const location = useLocation() const [genres, setGenres] = useState([]); // Get genres useEffect(() => { axios.get(genresUrl) .then(res => { setGenres(res.data.genres) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) }, []); console.log(genres) return (

{location.state.original_title}

({location.state.release_date.slice(0, 4)})

  • {location.state.vote_average}

  • / {location.state.vote_count} votes

  • Popularity: {Math.round(location.state.popularity)}

Language:

{location.state.original_language}

Release date:

{location.state.release_date}

Description:

{location.state.overview}
) } export default MovieDetails
